entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight then 40 percent chance of rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
